title: In a fix, HNIs await RBI directive on foreign FDs
description: Wealthy Indians are uncertain about investments abroad after a directive from the International Financial Services Centres Authority. It restricts fixed deposit terms in GIFT City to under 180 days, conflicting with Reserve Bank of India guidelines. This confusion affects funding to offshore banks and the liberalised remittance scheme for high-net-worth individuals.
